attributes.action: Stop the cuts in the arts to help fund for the London 2012 olympic games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: following the scathing criticisms made by british actors dame judi dench and rubert everett in the press recently about arts funds being used to help pay for the 2012 olympic games in london, we the public, declare that these cuts are thereby stopped to help preserve britain's arts community.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
